.pum-overlay:after,\n.pum-overlay *, .pum-overlay *:before, .pum-overlay *:after {\n  /* Safari/Chrome, other WebKit */\n  /* Firefox, other Gecko */\n  box-sizing: border-box;\n}\n\n.pum-container {\n  top: 100px;\n  position: absolute;\n  margin-bottom: 3em;\n  z-index: 1999999999;\n}\n\n.pum-container.pum-responsive {\n  left: 50%;\n  margin-left: -47.5%;\n  width: 95%;\n  height: auto;\n  overflow: visible;\n}\n\n.pum-container.pum-responsive img {\n  max-width: 100%;\n  height: auto;\n}\n\n@media only screen and (min-width: 1024px) {\n {\n    position: absolute;\n  }\n}\n\n.pum-container.custom-position {\n  left: auto;\n  top: auto;\n  margin-left: inherit;\n}\n\n.pum-container .pum-content > :last-child {\n  margin-bottom: .featured-post");\r\n\t\tfor(var i = 0; i < featuredItems.length; i+=5) {\r\n\t\t\tfeaturedItems.slice(i, i+5).wrapAll(\'<div class="featured-posts-single-slide"></div>\');\r\n\t}\r\n rel="bookmark">Police State Madness \xe2\x80\x94 Man Given Traffic Ticket for Not Having a Seatbelt ON HIS DOG</a></h3>\n<p class="post-meta">\n<span class="tie-date"><i class="fa fa-clock-o"></i>June 26, 2022</span>\n<span class="post-comments"><i class="fa fa-comments"></i><a class="cat-box-content">\n<ul>\n<li class="first-news">\n<div class="post-thumbnail">\n<a href="https://thefreethoughtproject.com/watch-cop-mistakes-unarmed-innocent-man-for-suspect-puts-a-bullet-in-the-back-of-his-head/" rel="bookmark">\n<img width="310" height="165" class="fa overlay-icon"></span>\n</a>\n</div>\n<h2 class="post-box-title"><a href="https://thefreethoughtproject.com/watch-cop-mistakes-unarmed-innocent-man-for-suspect-puts-a-bullet-in-the-back-of-his-head/" rel="bookmark">WATCH: Cop Mistakes Unarmed Innocent Man for Suspect \xe2\x80\x94 Puts a Bullet in the Back of His Head</a></h2>\n<p class="post-meta">\n<span class="tie-date"><i class="fa fa-clock-o"></i>June 24, 2022</span>\n<span class="post-comments"><i class="fa fa-comments"></i><a href="https://thefreethoughtproject.com/watch-cop-mistakes-unarmed-innocent-man-for-suspect-puts-a-bullet-in-the-back-of-his-head/#respond"><span class="dsq-postid" data-dsqidentifier="162813 https://thefreethoughtproject.com/?p=162813">0</span></a></span>\n</p>\n<div class="entry">\n<p>An apparently trigger-happy police officer mistook an innocent man for a suspect and put a bullet in the back of his head.</p>\n<a class="more-link" href="https://thefreethoughtproject.com/watch-cop-mistakes-unarmed-innocent-man-for-suspect-puts-a-bullet-in-the-back-of-his-head/">Read More &raquo;</a>\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class="other-news">\n<div class="post-thumbnail">\n<a href="https://thefreethoughtproject.com/cop-charged-after-attacking-innocent-woman-knocking-her-out-of-her-shoes-for-walking-her-dog/" rel="bookmark"><img width="110" class="fa overlay-icon"></span></a>\n</div>\n<h3 class="post-box-title"><a href="https://thefreethoughtproject.com/cop-charged-after-attacking-innocent-woman-knocking-her-out-of-her-shoes-for-walking-her-dog/" rel="bookmark">Cop Charged After Attacking Innocent Woman, Knocking Her Out of Her Shoes &#8212; For Walking Her Dog</a></h3>\n<p class="post-meta">\n<span class="tie-date"><i class="fa fa-clock-o"></i>June 18, 2022</span>\n<span class="post-comments"><i
